sentences.en: As it taxied towards the tug the pilot released his torpedo.
sentences.cn: 飞行员驾机滑向拖轮,随后投了鱼雷.

sentences.en: He wanted to confirm torpedo reeadiness for himself.
sentences.cn: 他还要亲自检查一下鱼雷是否准备好.

sentences.en: He was accused of trying to torpedo the talks.
sentences.cn: 他被指责试图破坏会谈.

sentences.en: His ship was blown up by a torpedo.
sentences.cn: 他的船被一枚鱼雷炸毁了.

sentences.en: However, it remains the only shipboard - submarine torpedo available for the PLA Navy.
sentences.cn: 然而, 它仍然是PLA海军可用的唯一舷侧反潜鱼雷.

sentences.en: Ice could freeze up their torpedo release mechanisms.
sentences.cn: 冰可能会冻死他们的鱼雷发射装置。

sentences.en: New threats of violence have effectively torpedoed the peace talks.
sentences.cn: 新的暴力威胁实际上已经破坏了和平谈判。

sentences.en: Olympic coach Gennadi Touretski tells Daniel Drollette how to torpedo the opposition.
sentences.cn: 奥林匹克客车GennadiTouretski告诉丹尼尔?德罗尔利特怎么到鱼雷反对.

sentences.en: Plane types include: Fighters, Dive Bombers, Torpedo Bombers, Bombers, and Experimental.
sentences.cn: 飞机类型包括: 战斗机, 俯冲轰炸机, 鱼雷轰炸机, 轰炸机, 教练机.

sentences.en: Remark: Bulge can protect your ship under the torpedo attack.
sentences.cn: 注: 船腹是防御各种鱼雷的攻击.

sentences.en: Some kinds of semi - physical simulation methods in torpedo - guided system were shown.
sentences.cn: 介绍了鱼雷自导系统的几种半实物仿真方法,分析了各自的特点.

sentences.en: Sometimes, when you go into small rooms, you can find very interesting things, like this torpedo.
sentences.cn: 有时候，你走进一些小房间里，你会发现非常有趣的东西，就像这个鱼雷。

sentences.en: The 14 - inch torpedo has no hope of crippling a modern dreadnought.
sentences.cn: 355毫米鱼雷不能重创一艘先进的无畏战舰.

sentences.en: The function, software and hardware of microcomputer control torpedo simulator are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了由单片机控制的鱼雷模拟训练器的功能及软、硬件设计.

sentences.en: These attacks are seen as an effort to torpedo the talks.
sentences.cn: 人们认为这些袭击是为了故意破坏会谈。

sentences.en: They are aircraft carriers, cruisers, destroyers, submarines, and torpedo - boats, etc.
sentences.cn: 有航空母舰 、 巡逻舰 、 驱逐舰 、 潜水艇 、 鱼雷艇等.

words.tran_cn: 鱼雷；[军]水雷；油井爆破筒；电鳐；职业杀手

trans.tran_cn: 鱼雷，油井爆破筒，[鱼]电鯆，职业杀手
trans.tran_en: a long narrow weapon that is fired under the surface of the sea and explodes when it hits something
to attack or destroy a ship with a torpedo

trans.tran_cn: 用鱼雷袭击，破坏，（在油井内）装置爆破筒，使失去（活动能力等）
